name: Sonali
title: A Book of Books
description: A collection that compiles thirteen compelling reasons to read, reflecting the author's deep love for books. This work serves as a reading recommendation guide and a celebration of literature.

name: Prabhupada
title: Bhagavad Gita As It Is
description: A spiritual scripture central to Hindu philosophy, this edition presents the teachings of Lord Krishna to Arjuna on the battlefield of Kurukshetra, with commentary by Swami Prabhupada.

name: Ekisha
title: Chhath
description: A cultural and spiritual exploration of the Chhath festival, emphasizing the worship of the Sun God and the connection to environmental awareness and devotion.

name: Keigo
title: Invisible Helix
description: A mystery thriller from the Detective Galileo series, combining scientific curiosity with gripping suspense and clever plot twists.

name: Namita
title: Life on Mars
description: A thought-provoking collection of short stories that blend the real with the surreal, exploring human emotions, aspirations, and imagination across different settings.

name: Harari
title: 21 Lessons for the 21st Century
description: This thought-provoking book explores the most pressing issues facing our modern world, from technological disruption and climate change to nationalism and fake news. Harari offers insights and reflections to help readers navigate the complexities of the 21st century.

name: Radhika
title: Fire on the Ganges
description: A compelling account of the sacred and spiritual life in Varanasi, centered on the lives of those who work and dwell around the cremation ghats. This book blends investigative journalism with cultural commentary.

name: Geronimo
title: Cavemice
description: A fun and adventurous children's story set in prehistoric times, where Geronimo Stilton and his friends must solve the mystery of a stolen magical pearl. Packed with humor and colorful illustrations.

name: Enid
title: The Famous Five
description: In this classic tale of mystery and adventure, the Famous Five return to Kirrin Island, where they uncover strange happenings and secret research. A timeless favorite for young readers.

name: Robert T.
title: Be Rich and Happy
description: This book aims to help readers develop new habits for financial and emotional success. It is authored by the creator of Rich Dad, Poor Dad and blends financial wisdom with personal development.

name: Sundeep
title: Crypto Storm
description: This book explores the rise of cryptocurrency in India, detailing how the nation became a pivotal force in the global crypto movement. It discusses the financial, political, and technological factors that fueled this revolution.

name: Ruskin
title: 7 Khoon Maaf
description: A gripping psychological tale about Susanna, a woman who marries seven times and is suspected of murdering each of her husbands. The book was adapted into a popular Bollywood film and includes the screenplay by Vishal Bhardwaj and Matthew Robbins.
